name: video players - transparent control bar & ads
description:
HTML5 players: Youtube, Vimeo, Vidfile, VK, TunePk, Openload, Sibnet.ru, google player, d-on, anyfiles, mp4up.
video control transparent - global style for all sites.
Transparent Youtube's ADS!
Transparent video control bar.
less opacity for mouse out.
This style improves readability of the subtitles !
additional_info:
10.01.2019 - update
V.2B 15.02.2018
Some fixes
....
Version 1.5B
Now works in: Vidfile, VK Player, TunePk, Openload, Sibnet.ru, jwplayer, d-on, anyfiles, mp4up, Vidloxtv, Thevideome, Okru, Rapidvideo, cda pb player. Bug fixes
Version 1.4B
Fied custom annotation visibility.
Version 1.4B
Advertising on YouTube now less visible.
version 1.3B
- Youtube: transparent advertising, clear more annotations, clear background gradient/shadow.
version 1.2B
- video annotations for You Tube now also transparent.
version 1.1B
- fixed autohide when user not active
version 1.0B
- start
